To address this concern, you want to make the AD FS service highly available, and you want to distribute application requests. Which of the following AD FS best practices will achieve these goals?

      Deploy multiple AD FS nodes for high availability and balancing the load

      Domain controllers should be deployed on the same network as the AD FS servers

      Never expose security token service (STS) servers directly to the Internet
